name: Pokémon Extreme Red
overview: Description: An improvement-type hack of Pokémon FireRed with a lot of new features and a ton of Pokémon to catch. Features: • Improved graphics • Pokémon from many generations • Mega Evolution • 66 Legendary Pokémon + 5 Specials • Moves from Gen 4 to 6 • Navel Rock and Birth Island • Fairy type • Physical/Special split • Updated Pokémon sprites • Day and night system • Updated battle backgrounds • B2/W2 Repel system • X / Y Experience system • Poison survival • Running indoors • Reusable TMs • Dark Pokémon
